name: Number 1!
description:
"Number 1!" is an exciting and action-packed game that challenges you to run, jump and dive your way to the finish line. In this game, you must compete against other characters in a running competition, but there's a twist - the race takes place above the earth on a series of platforms.

As you run across the platforms, you'll encounter all kinds of obstacles that will test your skills and reflexes. From gaps in the platforms to obstacles that block your path, you must use your powers of jumping and diving to avoid falling into the void and reach the finish line as quickly as possible.

"Number 1!" features a variety of different levels, each with its own set of challenges and obstacles. You'll need to use your quick thinking and lightning-fast reflexes to navigate the platforms and reach the end as quickly as possible. As you progress through the game, the levels become more and more challenging, and you'll need to use all your skills to come out on top.

Do you have what it takes to be the number one runner? Play "Number 1!" and find out!

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- Jumping and Diving skills
- Skin shop
